justification: "We used a previously developed Dictator Game paradigm that manipulates the cost of giving ... This paradigm has previously been used to generate independent estimates of advantageous and disadvantageous inequity aversion at the group level (Saez et al., 2015)."
The same Dictator Game paradigm is described as providing "independent estimates of advantageous and disadvantageous inequity aversion."

measured_by: total amount shared in the Dictator Game
justification: Planned analyses originally included "generosity (the total amount shared)" derived from participantsâ€™ allocation choices in the Dictator Game.

measured_by: sum of advantageous and disadvantageous inequity in the Dictator Game
justification: The authors note they had planned to evaluate "total inequity (advantageous plus disadvantageous)" based on Dictator Game allocations.
